pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, December 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, December 16, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the site of the Université de Montréal’s new Science Complex.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a joint announcement and hold a media availability with the Premier of Québec, Philippe Couillard.

Centre communautaire intergénérationnel d'Outremont
999 McEachran Avenue
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the announcement of a donation to the Montréal Neurological Institute and Hospital’s Open Science Initiative

Jeanne Timmins Amphitheatre
Montréal Neurological Institute and Hospital
McGill University
3801 University Street
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.


Media Appearance

8:00 a.m. ET – Live – Interview with Terry Di Monte for CHOM 97.7 FM
